question.text: On a motorway the amber reflective studs can be found between

explanation.text: On motorways reflective studs are located into the road to help you in the dark and in conditions of poor visibility. Amber-coloured studs are found on the right-hand edge of the main carriageway, next to the central reservation.

answer.text: the hard shoulder and the carriageway
the acceleration lane and the carriageway
the central reservation and the carriageway
